storyInfo: The Snowcap Incident closes out, each side winds down, and things seem to be developing in a better direction. Yet it's possible, too, that all this has only just begun.

attributes.content: Thousands of years ago, Kjeragandr descended into this land, naming it Kjerag and bestowing upon it Her eternal vigil.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: For thousands of years, Her teachings have continued to pervade the lives of all of Kjerag's people.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: She gave Her flesh to the Paleroche clan, Her hide to the Browntail clan, and Her bones to the Silverash clan.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But we all share a common name –– the people of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Our belief in Her is the foundation of Kjerag, and is also the reason why we stand here today and call ourselves the children of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: We all harbor the greatest respect for Her in our hearts, and work together to survive in this land to this day.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: However, as we all know now, Kjerag is not the only country in this world.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Beyond these snow-capped mountains lies a vast world filled with people who do not look like us, do not speak like us, and do not share our belief in Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: In the past, we've had terrible disagreements over how to deal with such people.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: In reality, these disagreements are not an existential crisis. Rather, they are Her way of testing us, Her way of guiding us.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: She is the object of faith for all the people of Kjerag, our mother and guardian.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: And as a mother, she never wishes to see her children stagnate.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Therefore...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Do not let your desire to preserve the old prevent you from trying the new. You are Her children, and you should be full of courage.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Do not let your nostalgia for your homeland prevent you from exploring new places. No matter where you go, She will walk with you.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Do not let what you already possess prevent you from seeking greater ventures, for you have the right to more in life.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: After all, She is tolerant. The land She protects should be tolerant, and Her people should also be tolerant.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: By the authority She has vested in me, I solemnly declare:
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The Vine-Bear Court will tolerate the beliefs of outsiders towards Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Furthermore, the Vine-Bear Court encourages all citizens to pursue a better life in their own ways.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: In the commemoration of the Saintess of Mount Karlan, the Illuminated One, known as the Blessed Enya Silverash, and the resounding speech she delivered to the people of Kjerag––
This day is officially designated a national religious day throughout the land.
The incident in the valley began as just an idle move.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I needed someone to distract the Paleroche clan so I could dispatch supplies and personnel in secret.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If not you, it could've been anyone else.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I planned on apologizing to you after all was said and done.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But now, I should probably apologize for underestimating the impact you would have.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Enciodes speaks to himself while moving a chess piece.
Gnosis is my good friend, as well as my collaborator.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: He and I do not necessarily see eye to eye – he has his own ideas and methods.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But I understand him.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As long as we share the same purpose, he will not betray me, nor do I need to exchange any information with him while executing a plan.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I could sit back and let him employ all his resources in whatever way he deemed efficacious to stymieing the power of the Browntail clan.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Destroying the railroad tracks was just a clever trick. Gnosis gained Ratatos's trust, and also blocked access to spies and Messengers from other countries.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Enciodes looks you in the eye and makes another move.
It's a draw.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As if foreshadowing the end result, Enciodes takes his hands off the pieces and spreads them out.
It means this round is over.
It would appear that my luck has been quite rotten lately.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I can't even win at chess anymore.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sometimes, a draw is a great victory. And other times, a draw is a crushing defeat.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: In your case, which one is it?

attributes.content: In my case... anything other than a great victory is a crushing defeat.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But this time... is indeed an exception.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Without a doubt, I have won.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But what I didn't expect was that you opened up another possibility for my victory.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: Another possibility?;I didn't have the means to persuade the Saintess to come down from the mountain.;I just wanted to prevent the loss of life.

attributes.content: Yes, another possibility.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I thought that outcome was impossible, but you managed to see through it and influence the situation even without knowing anything.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That doesn't change the fact that I won.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Perhaps it's been too long since I've had a worthy opponent, but such a close match truly made my heart swell.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The Saintess... does not need anyone making decisions for her.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But you nudged her at just the right moment, giving her a direction.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Furthermore, you set the stage for her.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And you would have me believe that you did all of this unintentionally?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You certainly achieved this objective.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You sought out Arctosz and Ratatos, made battle predictions for them preemptively, and provided a better plan to avoid war.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This very much fits your way of doing things, Doctor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Even I could not predict that this situation could be resolved in such a peaceful manner.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Surely, you understand why I was so eager to unite Kjerag under one banner.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I don't particularly hate the Vine-Bear Court, nor am I in any rush to eradicate religion from these lands.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Nor am I particularly dissatisfied with Arctosz's insularity or Ratatos's hesitation.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: They don't know the things that happen outside, and thus will not hold the same views as me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If I had enough time, I wouldn't mind spending five or ten years, or even longer, changing their minds and changing Kjerag in a gentler way.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But––
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Kjerag doesn't have enough time. Even if we cannot be considered rich, there are bound to be neighboring countries eyeing this land undisturbed by Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I must push us forward, and if there are people who cannot accept that, then I can only deprive them of their right to object.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That is all.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: You don't need to convince me.;These things are none of my business.

attributes.content: I am simply sharing some of my thoughts with people worthy of hearing them.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You saw these things as a bystander, which is the only reason I'm able to tell you this.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As far as I know, Arctosz will announce his responsibility for poisoning the Great Elder and resign as head of the clan.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As for why he decided to make this show of grace, he decided to make an oath with the Saintess so that the she would take control of the Paleroche lands.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Perhaps to cement the Saintess's status.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The Browntail clan has signed an agreement of subordination to the Silverash clan.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I can share some extra details with you. I have no desire to take over the Browntail clan; should Ratatos desire, her power would not be any less than it was in the past.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: There are no longer any left who desire stagnation, who refuse to budge, or would fret over costs and benefits. None stand in the way of Karlan Trade and Kjerag's development.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This is an outcome I can accept, Doctor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.options: You and the Saintess aren't so different.

attributes.content: But we ended up walking separate paths.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And, this is the result of my past choices. I will take responsibility for it.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: She, too, must bear the consequences of her choices, and lift the people of Kjerag out of this stagnation with her guidance, not my instigation.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You proved yourself to me and to Kjerag, but you also... proved Enya.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Mr. President, it's almost time for the meeting.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Regardless, Kjerag is about to undergo massive changes, Doctor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Next time, it may be difficult for me to meet with you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But I can assure you that Rhodes Island is free to come and go anywhere in Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Additionally, please accept this token of my goodwill as compensation for involving you and your operators in this incident.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Neither Rhodes Island's name nor yours will appear in any future official records related to this event.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Also, a new contract that will allow us to call each other allies is on its way to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: After this is all over, I will visit Rhodes Island again.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: And when that time comes, I hope to play another game of chess with you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Kjarr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You've got some guts, you know. How long have you been keeping me in the dark?!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Do forgive me, Saintess, for I know not how I have sinned.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Oh? So be it, then.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But, Kjarr, I do have something I want to ask you.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Yes, Saintess.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: ...I want to know, was it Her intention for me to become the leader of Kjerag?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Was all of this Her plan? Me feeling lost and confused throughout this entire chain of events, and then my determination when making that final choice––
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Did She expect all of that?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Kjarr understands why Enya suddenly asks that question now, of all times.
She is afraid.
She is not afraid that she made the wrong decision. But, she is afraid that everything, as far as her eyes can see, is just a game played by gods.
There is but one thing I can assure you...
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: She... has never once sought to interfere with your free will. Your thoughts have always been your own.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Who is to say whether Her miracles are nothing more than the wishes and fabrications of Her faithful?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Perhaps, She gave everything so that the people of wind and snow would have a pristine land to call home.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: She looks out over this land, searching for ways to bless the people who live here with happiness.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: As for the answer you gave – She acknowledges it, nothing more.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: If that's true, then can you do me a favor?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Name the favor.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Please ask Her not to take you away.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Isn't that what always happens in the stories? Though I've found my answer, it comes at the cost of losing you.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I will not ask favors of Her willy-nilly, so would you continue to be my maid?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: ...Pfft.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Haha... Hahaha.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Sorry, sorry. I didn't expect you to make such a cute request.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: But... let's do this according to chapter three of the scriptures.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: If one day, you no longer uphold the ideals you currently do, then I will no longer stay by your side. But, until then, I swear to serve as your head maid.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: No taking that back, okay?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You want me to be your representative to Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You can devote yourself to your research at Rhodes Island. I trust it'll be to your liking.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Did you already have that in mind when you invited them?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Just another possibility.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: After all, regardless of whether or not our plans succeed, your situation in Kjerag is only going to get worse.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You just didn't expect that the person you were trying to win over the most would almost sabotage your plan.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: That takes nothing from our victory.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Though if you want to stay in Kjerag, I can also arrange that for you.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Well, whatever.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: ...I don't mind the infamy, but I'd get annoyed if people kept coming by to throw rocks at my lab's windows.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Also, I'd like to meet this Doctor for myself.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Oh, are you interested?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As if. I simply want to see whether your Doctor, who has already left a mark on this land, will end up becoming our enemy.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: And if not?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Then I'd also like to know–– what level of technical prowess a company that has succeed in suppressing Oripathy possesses.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Gnosis, that gleeful hunger on your face looks about as bad as what you accused me of.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Gnosis, your luggage has been prepared. It's time to go.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Shall we leave now then?
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Just a moment.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Monch!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Nobody responds to Gnosis's call.
...Monch?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Within that plain room, everything stands in order – except the girl who always spoke with a hint of gloominess has disappeared.
He immediately spots a dagger sitting on the table in the middle of the room.
He gave that dagger to Monch.
He remains silent for a spell, then picks up the dagger and walks out the door.
The sun is shining outside.
Hey Doctor, look! They've already started selling Saintess-themed goods here.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: My, if it isn't Lady Ensia. Welcome back to my humble shop.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: You sure know how to keep up with the times.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: When I came back to Kjerag, you were still selling Vine-Bear Court merch. Now you've switched to selling stuff with the Saintess on it.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Hahaha, I'm not the only one. Plenty of folks all over the streets. We're even being encouraged to do business now.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Now that you mention it, those things I was hawking before, I didn't actually believe in them.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: But when I make goods for the Saintess, I have real faith in what I'm doing.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: When we first heard about the transfer of power, us businessfolks were real worried about what was going to happen.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: But I never imagined that the Saintess would be so open-minded.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Now, even the most stubborn of folk have nothing to say against dealing with foreigners.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Also, I heard that Sir Enciodes plans to meet with the Saintess for discussions to fully open Browntail and Paleroche territory to the outside world.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: If you ask me, I'm looking forward to seeing this new day more and more.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I'm glad to hear you say that.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You certainly ought to be!
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Take a look around you. Of all these people walking the street, who isn't smiling these days?
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Even though all that craziness happened during the ceremony, the Saintess was able to mediate the situation among the three clans.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: And that resulted in something most people could agree with.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Y'know, I have to thank the Saintess and Sir Enciodes for all this.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Oh right, were you planning on leaving Kjerag in that getup of yours?
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Yup, my vacation's coming to an end, so it's time for me to head back to continue my treatment and work.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: In that case, take whatever you want! It's on me!
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Treat it like my parting gift to you!
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: No need to be polite. You've earned it.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Alright, I'll take you up on it then.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I want this portrait of my sister, this embroidery, and that sculpture.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Hey, that picture––
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: A painting hanging on the wall catches Ensia's attention.
It's of her sister Enya and her brother Enciodes, standing at a negotiating table and shaking hands, seemingly reaching some sort of agreement.
For a moment, she pauses.
Ah, this painting depicts Sir Enciodes and the Saintess reaching an agreement on Kjerag's future.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Though I don't know if this scene actually happened, there's no doubt that those two are the ones governing Kjerag now...
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: And everyone knows they're siblings.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Surely, they must get along very well.
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Tell me, do they really?
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: Yup... Let's see if there's anything else...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Doctor, is there anything you want?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You got it!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Um... Lady Ensia, I did say you could have anything you wanted for free, but please try to have some mercy...
attributes.name: Kjerag Merchant

attributes.content: ...Doctor.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Though the two of us serve as Sir Enciodes's retainers, we are also employees of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: We would like to apologize to you... for all sorts of things.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Courier and I will not shamelessly ask for your forgiveness. We only hope that we will be allowed to come to Rhodes Island to visit Lady Ensia in the future.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: What do you think, Doctor?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: You were in a difficult situation. I understand.;......;I was a guest of the Paleroches. What does that have to do with you?

attributes.content: This situation is indeed excusable, which I'll note in the report.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: As for how the bosses will respond, that I cannot say.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Doctor, I know you don't assign any blame to them.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: But playing dumb isn't very smart.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Coincidentally, you also resolved some of Enciodes's affairs.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: If that's how you want to spin the account of what happened, then the report to Dr. Kal'tsit will take a bit of extra effort.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: And I certainly won't help you with that.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Thank you... Doctor, and Captain Sharp.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Thanks again.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Doctor, I've already said goodbye to my folks. I'm ready to go now.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Got all your stuff?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Instructor Dobermann!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: The Saintess became the de-facto leader of Kjerag, and Enciodes gained the power to leverage the majority of Kjerag's resources...
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Doctor, you ought to take my advice.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I didn't hear your name mentioned by anyone else, fortunately. By the looks of things, you people managed to not get involved this time, at least.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: By the looks of things, not only did you get yourselves involved, you got heavily involved.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I look forward to reading your reports.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Alright, if there's anything you have to say, save it for once we're on the road. Get in the car, we're heading back to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Doctor, do you remember that painting we saw in that store back there?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.options: The one with the handshake?;Not really.

attributes.content: Mmhmm.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Doctor, stop playing dumb. I know you remember it.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Right then and there, I really wanted to buy that painting.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But after thinking about it some more, I decided not to. I mean, I know that never happened.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: My brother just decided to let my sister have a move, that's all there was to it.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It's not your fault, Doctor.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Without you, the tension between those two would've only gotten more vicious.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But at least this helped me sort one thing out.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: And that is – regardless of which one of them made the decision, it came as a result of their beliefs.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You were just a catalyst in driving things forward.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Just like how nobody would try to convince me to give up mountain climbing.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Beliefs can't be so easily changed.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.options: They wouldn't be called beliefs if they could.

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But, I have another belief that won't be easily changed.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: One day, I'm going to make sure my brother and sister get along again, like they used to.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.options: (Perhaps the perils that Kjerag faces have only just begun.)
